name: The Man from the Window 2
description:
"Time will pass, the seasons may change, we know that nothing can ever stay the same...
But still The Man continues to play his twisted game."* Note, this game was made for Windows and will not function on other systems or devices!
** Also note, this game is 64-bit, and will not run on a 32-bit system!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Like what I do and want to support the games?
Then please kindly consider either buying this game, or consider donating to me on Ko-fi!
Thank you!
